boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C75B91.07C6CAA8" Date: Wed, 28 Feb 2007 18:34:46 -0500 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Re: DMCA Copyright Notice Thread-Index: AcdbkQfnOsJHgYKUQUyxbPmK6nlK/g== From: To: , X-OriginalArrivalTime: 28 Feb 2007 23:34:46.0840 (UTC) FILETIME=[08255B80:01C75B91] Received-SPF: none Subject: Re: [ADMINS] DMCA Copyright Notice X-BeenThere: planetadmins@lists.theplanet.com X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.7 Precedence: list List-Id: The Planet Admins list List-Unsubscribe: , List-Archive: List-Post: List-Help: List-Subscribe: , Sender: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com Errors-To: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear ISP: I am an attorney for Time Inc., the corporate publisher of People Magazine. This will put you on notice that Time Inc. has concluded an agreement with a photo agency for exclusive rights to publish photographs of Patrick Dempsey and his family (including his newborn twins) in People Magazine and on People.com. These are the only photographs of Mr. Dempsey and his twins now in existence. In the past you have hosted websites which posted photographs which have been licensed exclusively to Time Inc. for publication in People Magazine and on People.com, in violation of Time Inc.'s exclusive rights. Those websites include www.hollywoodrag.com. This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section 512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act that the posting of any photographs of Patrick Dempsey and/or any other member of his family with his newborn twins would infringe Time Inc.'s rights in North America, Australia and New Zealand. Be advised that by law, as a service provider, you must "expeditiously remove or disable access to" the infringing photograph upon receiving notice. Noncompliance may result in a loss of the possibility of immunity under the DMCA. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner set forth herein would not be authorized by of Time Inc., its licensing representatives, or the law. The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge. I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Time Inc. for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material. Very truly yours, Nicholas J. Jollymore Deputy General Counsel Time Inc. nicholas_jollymore@timeinc.com MIME element (text/html) Message

Dear ISP:

I am an attorney for Time Inc., the corporate publisher of People Magazine.  This will put you on notice that Time Inc. has concluded an agreement with a photo agency for exclusive rights to publish photographs of Patrick Dempsey and his family (including his newborn twins) in People Magazine and on People.com.  These are the only photographs of Mr. Dempsey and his twins now in existence.

In the past you have hosted websites which posted photographs which have been licensed exclusively to Time Inc. for publication in People Magazine and on People.com, in violation of Time Inc.’s exclusive rights.  Those websites include www.hollywoodrag.com.

This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section 512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act that the posting of any photographs of Patrick Dempsey and/or any other member of his family with his newborn twins would infringe Time Inc.’s rights in North America, Australia and New Zealand.  Be advised that by law, as a service provider, you must “expeditiously remove or disable access to” the infringing photograph upon receiving notice. Noncompliance may result in a loss of the possibility of immunity under the DMCA.

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner set forth herein would not be authorized by of Time Inc., its licensing representatives, or the law.  The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge.  I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Time Inc. for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material.

Very truly yours,

 

Nicholas J. Jollymore

Deputy General Counsel

Time Inc.

nicholas_jollymore@timeinc. com
